name: Prism Presets
description: A collection of customization presets and tweaks for Prism.

packages.name: Ecliptic
packages.subtitle: Clean and minimalistic theme pack
packages.localizedDescription: A clean and minimalistic theme pack. Exclusive to Prism.
packages.localizedDescriptionLong: Ecliptic is a clean and minimalistic theme pack designed exclusively for Prism, combining sleek visuals with cohesive customization options.

packages.name: Ecliptic Icons
packages.subtitle: Dark, clean icon theme
packages.localizedDescription: Dark, clean icon theme for Ecliptic.
packages.localizedDescriptionLong: Ecliptic Icons is a dark and clean icon theme designed to perfectly complement the Ecliptic preset.

packages.name: Ecliptic Wallpapers
packages.subtitle: Glassmorphic wallpapers
packages.localizedDescription: Clean and glassmorphic wallpapers for Ecliptic.
packages.localizedDescriptionLong: A collection of clean, glassmorphic wallpapers designed to enhance the Ecliptic aesthetic.

groups.name: Ecliptic Collection
groups.description: Everything included with the Ecliptic preset
